meanings.definition: A person who is skilled at creating or appreciating humor.
meanings.sent1: The humorists at the comedy club had the audience laughing all night.
meanings.sent2: The humorists in the writing class shared funny stories with each other.
meanings.sent3: The humorists at the party told jokes that had everyone in stitches.
meanings.sent4: The humorists in the office were like comedians in a sitcom, always making people smile.
meanings.sent5: The humorists on the TV show made the audience burst into laughter with their witty jokes.

meanings.definition: The collective group of individuals who specialize in humor.
meanings.sent1: During the comedy festival, humorists from around the world gathered to showcase their talent.
meanings.sent2: The humorists in the online community shared memes and jokes with each other.
meanings.sent3: The humorists at the event formed a hilarious team that kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: The humorists in the industry were like a group of jesters bringing joy to people's lives.
meanings.sent5: The humorists in the book club made reading sessions fun with their witty comments.
